The Porchlight Dispatch

Romance logistics, reconciled nightly by Brent Mallory and Sergeant Muffin

Publisher: Brent Mallory, suburban father of two, former regional pallet scheduler, now founder of Porchlight Pairings.

I built Porchlight Pairings because my neighborhood block party had 43 deviled eggs and zero emotional closure. Our app schedules first dates like supply drops. My cat, Sergeant Muffin, still approves every charge by sitting on the keyboard. Yes, accounting cries daily.

Late-night bulletin: jazz trio still live in the den, drummer still paid in lasagna, and Sergeant Muffin just converted another $19.00 date credit into $19.11 because "extra fish tax." I don't argue with rank.

Tonight's Reliability Score: 94.2% on-date arrivals, 0% silence at check presentation.
